name: Magic Line Music Best Puzzle Game 2016 Brain Train
name_original: Magic Line Music Best Puzzle Game 2016 Brain Train
description:
Magic Line Music Best Puzzle Game 2016 Brain Train - The combination of puzzle and music, science and romance.

Magic Line Music Best Puzzle Game 2016 Brain Train game has simple gameplay but highly challenging, requiring much thought and logical thinking of a player. Suitable for relax, killing time and compete with friends.

Your mission is to connect all of the numbers together in the order 1, 2, 3, ... by a single line. And not to empty any cell in the board.

The difficulty of the game increases as each level gives players the feeling of excitement and excitement every time conquered new level. Players will be instructed how to play in the first 3 levels.

Magic Line Music Best Puzzle Game 2016 Brain Train game designed with simple and eye-catching style, retrieved 7 Rainbow colors do mainstream.

The interesting point of the Magic Line Music Best Puzzle Game 2016 Brain Train game is while playing will be wordless piano music is played. Each level will randomly display an timeless music is selected.

In the Magic Line Music Best Puzzle Game 2016 Brain Train game has used the following tracks:
+ A Little Love - Fiona Fung
+ A Time For Us - Andy Williams
+ All I Have to Do Is Dream - Everly Brothers
+ Alphabet Song - Charles Bradlee
+ As Long As You Love Me - Backstreet Boys
+ Barbie Girl - Aqua
+ Big Big World - Emilia
+ Boulevard - Dan Byrd
+ Call Me Maybe - Carly Rae Jepsen
+ For Elise - Beethoven
+ Happy Birthday - Traditional
+ I Lay My Love On You - Westlife
+ Let It Go - Idina Menzel
+ Mean - Taylor Swift
+ Nokia Classic Ringtone - Nokia
+ Only Love - Trademark
+ Proud Of You - Fiona Fung
+ Rhythm Of The Rain - The Cascades
+ Skyfall - Adele
+ Someone Like You - Adele
+ Take Me To Your Heart - Michael Learns to Rock
+ We Are The World - Michael Jackson
+ When I Was Your Man - Bruno Mars
+ Zip a Dee Doo Dah - Disney

Magic Line Music Best Puzzle Game 2016 Brain Train game offers over 1200 levels with the pack Beginner, 5x5, 6x6, 7x7, 8x8, 9x9, 10x10, 11x11, 12x12 and will continue to add more updates. The packs from 8x8 onwards will be locked. To play these packs you need to pass all the previous levels or to pay a small amount to unlock.

If it's difficult to pass any level, you can use the hints. Magic Line Music Best Puzzle Game 2016 Brain Train game will give you 5 free hints. To get more hints you can choose between paying a small amount, or watching ads video.

We look forward to receive your feedback about this game for further improvement. Hope this game can bring the excited moment for all of you guys.
